query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `contact_responses` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `messageId` int NOT NULL,
  `responseText` text NOT NULL,
  `isAiGenerated` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `approvedBy` int,
  `approvedAt` datetime,
  `sentAt` datetime,
  `deliveryStatus` enum('draft','approved','sent','failed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft',
  `errorMessage` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `contact_responses_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `idx_contact_responses_message` (`messageId`),
  INDEX `idx_contact_responses_status` (`deliveryStatus`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2Wv7ueKqB8G6f57.b62a6ae065f5 --database jFmY8c2b9B6TEBRxmcJws8 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `contact_responses` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `messageId` int NOT NULL,
  `responseText` text NOT NULL,
  `isAiGenerated` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `approvedBy` int,
  `approvedAt` datetime,
  `sentAt` datetime,
  `deliveryStatus` enum('draft','approved','sent','failed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft',
  `errorMessage` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `contact_responses_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `idx_contact_responses_message` (`messageId`),
  INDEX `idx_contact_responses_status` (`deliveryStatus`)
);
